alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:10PM AKST until December 13 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...From Dillingham west. * WHEN... This afternoon through 5 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility to one half mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will develop along the coast as snowfall begins, mainly west of Dillingham towards Togiak. Stronger winds will diminish early Tuesday morning along the coast as temperatures warm,ending the threat for blowing snow. Light snow will continue across much of Bristol Bay through Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
